opening.greeting: Welcome to your health history questionnaire!
opening.statement: Before you begin, please review the information below to ensure you’re prepared to answer a series of questions related to your personal medical history.

landing.medical-contacts: Contact information for any doctors, hospitals or clinics you’ve visited within the last 10 years.
landing.medication: Names and dosages of current prescription medications.
landing.duration-body: This questionnaire usually takes about 25 minutes, but it can run shorter or longer, depending on your specific history.
landing.confidential-body: Your responses are confidential and will only be used to evaluate your application for life insurance with Pacific Life.
landing.auto-save-body: Don't worry about losing your progress. We auto save it for you.
landing.chatbot-body: You can also use our chatbot for questions related to your interview or your application status.
landing.customer-service-body: If you need help at any point during your questionnaire, we're available from 9AM - 5PM PST at
landing.additional-assistance-body: If you want to continue your questionnaire over the phone, you have the option to request a live telephone interview by calling customer support at
landing.legal-understanding: I understand that the information I provide will be used to underwrite my life insurance application and will be completed to the best of my knowledge and belief.
